nodeMetric.field_description: Page Reach is a count of the number of people who viewed your pages or posts at least once.

body.summary: Page Reach is a count of the number of people who viewed your pages or posts at least once.

field_related_metrics.field_description: Page Impressions is the total number of times your pages are shown.
Page Likes, which is mostly applicable to social platforms, counts the number of unique visitors who have liked your page.
